text: This article aims to list all computer games that provide support for the Roland MT-32 family of sound modules. A separate major section is provided (in alphabetical order) for each computer system, which contains a table or list of MT-32 compatible games along with any relevant notes: ==Atari ST== * The Adventures of Maddog Williams in the Dungeons of Duridian * Codename: ICEMAN * The Colonel's Bequest * Conquests of Camelot: The Search for the Grail * Cruise for a Corpse * Hero's Quest * King's Quest IV * Leisure Suit Larry Goes Looking for Love (in Several Wrong Places) * Leisure Suit Larry III: Passionate Patti in Pursuit of the Pulsating Pectorals * Operation Stealth * Police Quest II: The Vengeance * Space Quest III * Ultima III * Ultima IV ==Commodore Amiga== * Castle of Dr. Brain * Conquests of the Longbow * Hoyle's Official Book of Games: Volume 3 * King's Quest (1991 remake) * King's Quest V * Leisure Suit Larry in the Land of the Lounge Lizards (1991 remake) * Leisure Suit Larry 5: Passionate Patti Does a Little Undercover Work * Mixed Up Mother Goose (1991 remake) * Police Quest III * Quest for Glory II: Trial by Fire * Space Quest (1991 remake) * Space Quest III * Space Quest IV ==IBM PC compatibles== ===Table of compatible games=== {| class="wikitable sortable" Sequel to Legend|| || || || || |- |Worlds of Ultima: The Savage Empire | || || || || || |- |Wrath of the Demon | || || || || || |- |X-COM: Terror from the Deep | || || || || ||General MIDI? |- |Z | || || || || || |- |Zeliard | |||| || || ||NEC PC-88 OPN |- |Zool | || || || || || |} ====Table Notes==== ===Games that falsely claim MT-32 compatibility=== The following games claim to be MT-32 compatible but in fact are not. The most common case is that they allow MT-32 or compatible devices to be chosen as configuration options, but they play General MIDI music instead: * Abuse * Albion: Plays on channels other than 2-10 and does not use sensible instruments * Anvil of Dawn: plays on channels other than 2-10 * Black Knight: Marine Strike Fighter * Day of the Viper: only outputs MIDI on channel 1 * Discworld * Frontier: First Encounters * The Incredible Machine: plays on channels other than 2-10 * Little Big Adventure (aka Relentless) *Sensible World of Soccer v1.0 (unverified) *Sensible World of Soccer European Championship Edition (unverified) * Sensible World of Soccer 96-97 * The Settlers II * Skynet: MT-32 driver fails to initialize * Super Fighter: Doesn't initialize instruments. Another MT-32 compatible game must be run first * Super Street Fighter II Turbo: sends General MIDI data * Whiplash (aka Fatal Racing) ==MSX== * Illusion City * Xak III - Tower of Gazzel * Famicle Parodic II * Megadoom * Meteorite Kiss ==NEC PC-9800 series== * A Ressha de Ikou: A-Train (A列車で行こう 復刻版) * A Ressha de Ikou: A-Train 4 (A列車で行こうIV) * Amaranth 2 (アマランス２) * Amaranth 2 Music Disk (アマランス２ ミュージックディスク) * Amaranth 3 (アマランス３) * Arcus 3 (アークス３) * Ash (アッシュ) * Bacta 2 (バクタ２) * Branmarker 2 (ブランマーカー２) * Bunretsu Shugyo Shin Twinkle Star (分裂守護神トゥインクル☆スター) * Check Six 2 -Hekiku no Ohkami- (チェックシックス２ 碧空の狼) * Crystal Rinal (クリスタルリナール -逢魔の迷宮-) * Cyber Alpha (サイバノイドアルファ) * Cyber Arms Val-Kaizer (機甲装神ヴァルカイザー) * D'Ark Gaiden (ディー・アーク 外伝) * D: European Mirage Ｄ ([欧州蜃気楼]) * Daitoua Mokujiroku Goh (大東亜黙示録 轟) * Dead Force (新世紀興亡史 デッドフォース) * Diamond Players (ダイヤモンドプレイヤーズ) * Edge (エッジ) * Eikanwa Kimini 3 (栄冠は君に3 高校野球全国大会) * Farland Story (ファーランドストーリー) * Frontier Universe (フロンティアユニヴァース) * Fuga Selection: Calcutta (風雅セレクション1 ～カルカッタ～) * Fuga Selection: Maze Quest (風雅セレクション1 ～メイズクエスト～) * Fushigi no Umi no Nadia (ふしぎの海のナディア -The Secret of the Blue Water-) * Gakuen Bakuretsu Tenkousei (学園爆裂転校生！) * Gemini Wing (ジェミニウィング) * Geneitoshi: Illusion City (幻影都市) * Ginga Eiyuu Densetsu IV 銀河英雄伝説IV * Gods (ＧＯＤＳ 神となる男の伝説) * Goh 2 (轟2) * Graystone Saga: Demon's Fountain (グレイストンサーガ 魔界の泉) * Gulf War Soukouden GULF WAR (蒼鋼伝) * Hiouden (緋王伝) * Hiouden 2 (緋王伝2) * Hiouden 2 Dash (緋王伝2 HD) * Hoshi no Suna Monogatari 3 (星の砂物語3) * Kagami (鏡 -mirror-) * Lenum (レナム) * Lightning Warrior Raidy (雷の戦士ライディ) * Lightning Warrior Raidy 2 (雷の戦士ライディ２) * Lunatic Dawn (ルナティックドーン) * Mahjongg Fantasia 2 (麻雀幻想曲２) * Marple Magic (ま～ぷる・まぢっく) * Mirage 2 (ミラージュ2) * Night Slave (ナイト・スレイブ) * Niko Niko (にこにこ) * Oerstedia (エルステディア) * Ponron Senshi Sanina no Densetsu (サニーナの伝説) * Princess Maker 2 (プリンセスメーカー2) * Quiz Bonnou Yobikou 2 (煩悩予備校2) * Quiz Bonnou Yobikou 3 (煩悩予備校3) * Ring Out!! (リングアウト！！) * Rouge no Densetsu (ルージュの伝説) * Shinsengumi (新撰組 ～幕末幻視行～) * Solfleet: Taiyou Keiren Poukou Ryuuki (ソルフリート 太陽系連邦興隆記) * Span of Dream (スパン オブ ドリーム) * Star Cruiser II (スタークルーザーII) * Steam Heart's スチームハーツ * Story of Eastern Wonderland (東方封魔録) * Suzaku (スザク) * Sword Dancer (ソードダンサー) * Sword Dancer Zoukango (ソードダンサー増刊号) * Sword Dancer Zoukango 93( ソードダンサー増刊号 ９３) * Takamizawa Kyousuke Nekketsu!! MIDNIGHT編) * Zan 2: Kagerou no Jidai (斬2 ～陽炎の時代～) * Zan 2: Soshuhen (斬2 ～陽炎の時代～ 総集編) * Zan 3: Tenun Ware ni Ari (斬3 ～天運我にあり～) * Zan: Yaksa Embukyoku (斬 ～夜叉円舞曲～) * Zatuon Ryouiki (雑音領域) * Zen Nihon Bishoujo Mahjong Senshu Kentaikai Heart de Ron!! (全日本美少女麻雀選手権大会 ハートでロン!!) ==Sharp X68000== This is a list of MIDI supported games for the X68000 computer. Specific modules which are unlisted under a particular game may be incompatible or sound otherwise incorrect with that game. List is in the format: (Romanized Name | Japanese Name | Officially Supported Modules) * 38Man Kiro no Kokuu | ３８万キロの虚空 | MT-32 * 38Man Kiro no Kokuu CM-64Ver | ３８万キロの虚空 | CM-64 (alternate version) * Akumajou Dracula | 悪魔城ドラキュラ | MT-32, SC-55 (unofficial support of GM compatibles) * Asuka 120% Burning Fest | あすか120％ BURNING Fest．| SC-55, Yamaha TG-100 * Alshark | アルシャーク | MT-32 * Angel Dive | エンジェルダイブ | SC-55 * Arcus Odyssey | アークスオデッセイ | MT-32 * Atomic Robo-Kid | アトミックロボキッド | MT-32 * Bells Avenue Vol. 1 | ベルズアベニュー vol.1 | MT-32 * Bells Avenue Vol. 2 | ベルズアベニュー vol2 | LA compatibles, GS compatibles * Bells Avenue Vol. 3 | ベルズアベニュー vol.3 | MT-32, SC-55 * Be Rain | ビィレイン | MT-32 * Bonnou Yobikou 3 | 煩悩予備校3 | MT-32 * Carat | キャラット | SC-55 * Choujin | 超人 | MT-32, CM-64 (supports CM-64 expansion cards SN-U110-07 and SN-U110-10), SC-55 * Cynthia | シンシア | GS compatibles (only the one disk version supports midi) * Detana!!
